channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 由于汽车出口强劲，日本出口连续第三个月增长，为经济提供了支持
item.description:
Japan’s exports grew for a third consecutive month on the back of robust shipments of vehicles, offering support for the economy https://t.co/mJWpEgWHv6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 英格兰银行可能将利率维持在 16 年高位
item.description:
The Bank of England is likely to keep interest rates at a 16-year high https://t.co/sU5gIvpcaU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 一家美国支持的贷款机构向一家澳大利亚矿商提供了 6 亿美元贷款，用于开发稀土项目，这是澳大利亚为将关键矿产供应链扩展到中国以外地区而采取的最新举措。
item.description:
A US-backed lender has offered an Australian miner $600 million in loans to develop a rare earths project, the latest move to expand the critical minerals supply chain outside of China https://t.co/SzXjYnGErR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 由于选举承诺引发了对预算的担忧和可能出现的支出狂潮，国际投资者对印尼债券变得畏首畏尾。
item.description:
International investors have become skittish over Indonesian bonds as election pledges have spurred burgeoning budgetary fears and a possible spending spree https://t.co/fL4gALjFeo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 中国的彩票店摒弃了平淡无奇的店面，重新打造成为时髦人士的聚集地，以快速致富的诱惑吸引年轻人的目光
item.description:
Lottery shops in China are ditching bland storefronts to reinvent themselves as hipster hangouts, tempting young people with the lure of getting rich quick https://t.co/CLefi0QfQC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: Circle K 连锁便利店和加油站所有者的销售额和利润均出现下滑，这是美国消费者减少消费的一个信号
item.description:
The owner of the Circle K chain of convenience stores and gas stations saw its sales and profit decline, a signal that US consumers are cutting back on spending https://t.co/RcSE4ooItk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 由于投资者权衡日本和美国的利率前景，日元八天来首次走强
item.description:
The yen strengthened for the first time in eight days as investors weighed the outlook for interest rates in Japan and the US https://t.co/WjnpgPHL8t

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: 日本央行的政策决定加速了日元的跌势，日本股市将在公众假期后重新开盘时上涨
item.description:
Japanese stocks are set to rise when markets reopen from a public holiday after the Bank of Japan’s policy decision accelerated the yen’s drop https://t.co/HBKTG13d0K

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 21, 2024

item.title: Vitruvian Partners 是一家管理着 160 亿欧元（约合 175 亿美元）资产的投资公司，该公司正在探索包括出售少数股权在内的各种选择。New w/ @DNair5 ⬇️
item.description:
Vitruvian Partners, an investment firm with €16 billion ($17.5 billion) of assets under management, is exploring options including the sale of a minority stake.

New w/ @DNair5 ⬇️ https://t.co/S0wCIWY2NY

— Gillian Tan (@GillianTan) March 20, 2024

item.title: 今日必读📣美联储预计今年降息三次⚔美议员盯上中国无人机🐧腾讯拟回购超千亿港元股票获取免费中文电子报《彭博财经早茶》，洞悉全球市场动态。Catch up on what's moving China's markets in our free Chinese language newsletter.点击订阅 Sign up here ⬇

item.title: 在关闭麦格理亚洲阿尔法基金（Macquarie Asian Alpha Fund）五年后，资深基金经理尼克-伯德（Nick Bird）带着一个更聪明、规模更小的基金回来了。原因如下
item.description:
Five years after shutting down Macquarie Asian Alpha Fund, veteran fund manager Nick Bird is back with a smarter — and a lot smaller — fund, on purpose. Here's why https://t.co/Y0qlRjnnzq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 香港金融管理局跟随美联储维持基准利率不变
item.description:
The Hong Kong Monetary Authority followed the Fed in holding its base rate https://t.co/IHTLHcrAr1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 2018 年，当通用电气聘请拉里-卡普（Larry Culp）担任首席执行官时，这家公司已经过于庞大和复杂。他是这样拆解这家拥有 131 年历史的美国巨头的
item.description:
When GE brought on Larry Culp as CEO in 2018, the company was far too big and complicated for its own good. This is how he dismantled a 131-year-old American giant https://t.co/IU9OrOFsa8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 了解全球市场的最新动态。

Get up to speed on what's moving global markets. https://t.co/IaPF1vy5MP

item.title: 德国最大的工会之一 IG Metall 在代表柏林郊外一家特斯拉工厂工人的委员会选举中未能获得多数票。
item.description:
IG Metall, one of Germany’s largest unions, fell short of a majority in a contested election for the council that represents workers at a Tesla factory outside Berlin https://t.co/ZttfH62RjN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在通往低通胀和稳定通胀的道路上遭遇挫折后，美联储政策制定者目前基本坚持其降息路线
item.description:
Fed policymakers are largely sticking to their path of interest-rate cuts — for now — after hitting a bump on the road to low and steady inflation https://t.co/LkKpjoGzOm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 彭博社的一项调查显示，美国股市在对美联储 3 月会议的热烈反应之后即将失去动力
item.description:
US stocks are about to lose momentum after their exuberant reaction to the Fed's March meeting, a Bloomberg survey shows https://t.co/z16qT7ruZK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美联储维持今年三次降息的前景后，黄金价格首次突破每盎司 2,200 美元
item.description:
Gold topped $2,200 an ounce for the first time after the Fed maintained its outlook for three rate cuts this year https://t.co/rgXExWnhZG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 随着爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡（Leo Varadkar）的突然下台，民族主义的新芬党现在有机会在 2025 年或更早首次掌权。
item.description:
With the sudden exit of Irish Prime Minister Leo Varadkar, the nationalist Sinn Fein party now has an opportunity to take power for the first time in 2025, or sooner https://t.co/taj7asqaHj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 新西兰经济在去年最后三个月意外萎缩，确认了经济衰退的事实
item.description:
New Zealand’s economy unexpectedly contracted in the final three months of last year, confirming a recession https://t.co/JsY0XPDY9v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 日本央行 17 年来首次提高利率。谁将从这一决定中获益，谁又将蒙受损失？收听 Big Take 播客
item.description:
For the first time in 17 years, the Bank of Japan has increased its interest rates. Who will benefit and who will lose from this decision? Listen to the Big Take podcast https://t.co/STmoMqvClA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美联储维持 2024 年三次降息的展望
item.description:
The Fed maintained its outlook for three rate cuts in 2024 https://t.co/CBAxesMln7

item.description:

Brazil’s central bank cut its key interest rate by a half-point for the sixth time as inflation is expected to further slow down https://t.co/oWQtbyPQPZ

item.title: 澳大利亚煤炭生产商正越来越多地涉足高息私人贷款，因为贷款人希望取代因环境、社会和公司治理问题而不情愿的银行
item.description:
Australian coal producers are increasingly dabbling in high-interest private loans as lenders look to replace reluctant banks that are held back by ESG concerns https://t.co/fooxAHamKM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 反垄断监督机构表示，新西兰政府应考虑增加 Kiwibank 获得资本的机会，使其成为 "颠覆性的竞争对手"。
item.description:
The New Zealand government should consider increasing Kiwibank’s access to capital to turn it into a “disruptive competitor,” the antitrust watchdog said. https://t.co/yhDkLHt93m

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的语气开始有点像长途旅行中的父母。渴望降息的投资者不断追问："我们到了吗？他反复的回答归结为："快了，只是还没到"
item.description:
Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is starting to sound a bit like a parent on an extended road trip. Investors eager for interest-rate cuts keep asking, “Are we there yet?” His repeated reply boils down to: “Soon, just not yet” https://t.co/YDKKXy5vj4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）本月将转向液化天然气进口，以确保供应，同时对一条主要海上管道进行维护工作
item.description:
Petrobras is turning to liquefied natural gas imports this month to secure supplies while it carries out maintenance work at a major offshore pipeline https://t.co/SoumzjbkYp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024
